name: places/ChIJ6VOKqqRZwokRMpGAnUu14a0
formattedAddress: 125 W 21st St FRNT 1, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 125 W 21st St FRNT 1, New York, NY 10011, USA

editorialSummary.text: Retail location for a painting supplies manufacturer of both interior & exterior products.

originalText.text: From my experience with the W. 21st Street store, the associate was so honest with me as the light grey paint had a bluish tint to it and advised me to choose the color from Benjamin Moore and bring it back as Sherwin Williams paint is better and Benjamin Moore had more vibrant colors and that was so TRUE.  The paint was fabulous and look like light gray without the bluish tint to it.  I am beyond satisfied and went back and bought more paint.  This is my 3rd time buying paint from Sherwin Williams and I am thrilled.  Great customer service.

text.text: From my experience with the W. 21st Street store, the associate was so honest with me as the light grey paint had a bluish tint to it and advised me to choose the color from Benjamin Moore and bring it back as Sherwin Williams paint is better and Benjamin Moore had more vibrant colors and that was so TRUE.  The paint was fabulous and look like light gray without the bluish tint to it.  I am beyond satisfied and went back and bought more paint.  This is my 3rd time buying paint from Sherwin Williams and I am thrilled.  Great customer service.

originalText.text:
I have been specifying sherwin Williams paints as a designer literally for decades! The main reason is that the fan deck is easier to use then most others on the market. Gradations between colors are subtle and colors are beautiful, rich and sophisticated. I have favorites such as “ shoji white” for trim I use as standards. I personally can’t live without some “ opaline” in Florida I used “ sea salt” as the light was stronger…
Lately “ alpaca” has become a clients favorite. In the past “ city loft” was popular, also “ misty” and “ pale peony”
Decades ago there was an amazing color called “ pale artichoke”
So many fantastic colors and so many more opportunities to use them.
The quality of the paints is great and the staff are super friendly. I enjoy working with Cindy and the 8x10 paint samples are very helpful when trying out colors before making a final commitment!
Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Huge paint store with a great selection of paint and painting supplies. At 5pm on a weekday, there were limited staff members on site, so give yourself time to get in and out even if you're just picking up samples. I was impressed with the speed in which my paint samples were mixed and the staff was friendly (even if they didn't give me free chip brushes like the Brooklyn location).

originalText.text: Many painting accessories on sale.   Knowledgeable staff.   Can mix custom colors with programmable machine.   I'm not an expert on the actual paint quality compared to other brands but has held up fine for me.   Rarely does a stain set into the paint that cannot be wiped off with a general purpose cleaner.

originalText.text: This place is amazing when I called the guy was super helpful then when I went in person the guy was even more helpful this place is amazing I'm definitely coming back here very nice store and very humble , if you ever go to a paint shop I recommend going here 100%
